title: Integrated Learning Design for Remote and Virtual Laboratories in Online Engineering Experiments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Conducting Experiments in Smartphone-Based Limited-Tech Environments with IoT and Edge-Cloud Computing-Enabled Virtual Lab Platforms

learning_goals: Learners can independently design engineering experiment procedures based on mathematical modeling using remote laboratory tools.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate experimental results by collecting and analyzing IoT data in a virtual laboratory environment.
Learners can periodically diagnose their experimental processes and outcomes through learning analytics tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
